ai-dt2.8:0.3_0: with the eighth parts of requisites associated with it,
ai-dt2.8:1.1_0: thoughts known by the form constituents (of mind and body) that provide fuel for attachment which are associated with the sense fields,?
ai-dt2.8:1.2_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-dt2.8:2.6_0: thoughts that are associated with fetters, and are phenomena.
ai-dt2.8:2.7_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-dt2.8:3.2_0: then the life-span, mind and bodily form,
ai-dt2.8:3.3_0: Rebirth the six sense fields, old age, and death.
ai-dt2.8:3.4_0: Then two on the bank of the river.
ai-dt2.8:4.2_0: all four others like the cow’s.
ai-dt2.8:4.6_0: Delusion in vain, he can ask for too much.
ai-dt2.8:5.1_0: the eighth parts associated with the parted.
